outcome: Harmonist-aligned investigators discover a broken smart mirror in a secure government facility. It flickers erratically, displaying both normal reflections and encrypted, ephemeral messages attributed to "MH/37-A". Signs point to systemic sabotage within the Council, spurring a divided response.

events.description: Maintenance crew uncovers a broken smart mirror in Council Sector E. Security footage hints at unauthorized late-night access prior to the malfunction.
Harmonist engineers analyze the mirror, detecting looping, self-erasing messages signed "MH/37-A" with data pointing at critical BCI subsystems and an internal Council override.
Council factions discreetly clash after evidence from the mirror suggests a deeply embedded saboteur within the governing circle. Directorate demands sweeping loyalty checks.
Leaked smart mirror details fuel speculation of a Council traitor. BCI scoring for key political figures abruptly changes, leading to abrupt demotions and suspensions throughout the administration.
